refnamediv.refpurpose: Retrieves various runtime behaviours of the current FTP stream

refsect1.title: Description

note.para: This function is only available in CVS.

refsect1.para: Returns the value on success, or &false; if the given option is not supported. In the latter case, a warning message is also thrown.

This function returns the value for the requested option from the specified stream . Currently, the following options are supported:
Supported runtime FTP options
FTP_TIMEOUT_SEC Returns the current timeout used for network related operations.

example.title: ftp_get_option example
example.programlisting: // Get the timeout of the given FTP stream $timeout = ftp_get_option($conn_id, FTP_TIMEOUT_SEC);
